author: randyk
msg: On Win32, add to the PATH the apr bin directory (or the directory
containing apache.exe, if the latter isn't available) when running
the tests, so that the needed dlls to run Apache can be found.

author: stas
msg: fix an old outstanding bug in the APR::Table's TIE interface with
each()/values() over tables with multi-values keys. Now the produced
order is correct and consistent with keys(). Though, values() works
correctly only with perl 5.8.x and higher.

author: stas
msg: move num_of_tests to the top, so it's easier to maintain it

author: stas
msg: require Perl 5.6.1, 5.6.0 isn't supported for a long time, but we
weren't aborting at the Makefile.PL stage
